name: aNEMOne (Courtney Spivey, mattyjenks, D4ngus1)
description:
Foster a symbiotic relationship between nemo (clownfishes) and sea anemone. As the clownfish fend off the parasites, big fish, and seaweeds from overtaking and eating the sea anemone, the sea anemone provides shelter and attacks bigger fish with toxin. Help the two creatures upgrade in their ecosystem until they are unstoppable!
